locations.gameintro: In the year 1692, during the Salem Witch trials, another heretical entity comes into being: the Undead.NLYou are a young witch trying to leave your village in order to escape from the Puritans who have hanged or burned other suspected witches in town.NLLeaving the village has become more complicated now that you have to avoid not only the townsfolk, but also...ZOMBIES.

location.name: house
location.description: You wake up to the sound of the church bell ringing.NLYour mother is baking bread on the stove, and rocking in a chair.NLYou get out of bed, and go to her.NL"They're coming for you," she says.NLShe hands you a bag, and says "Better pack your things and sneak out while you can.NLYou are in your house.NLGather your things and sneak away.
location.question: What would you like to do?NLOpen front doorNLOpen back doorNLOpen closetNLOpen window
location.exits: front door, window, back door, closet
location.frontdoordesc: You opened the door and villagers hit you with stones!NLYour health has decreased.
location.backdoordesc: You open the back door and are swarmed by zombies who rip you and your mother apart.
location.windowdesc: You crawl through the window, evading villagers and zombies, and make it to the Market.
location.closetdesc: You opened the closet, and find a necklace your mother gave you. You put it on.

location.name: market
location.description: You are now in Aris Market Square.
location.question: What area would you like to explore next?NLExplore WhichWich SandWichNLExplore Shoe Lady ShopNLExplore WhichToSlay Church"
location.exits: which wich sandwiches, shoe lady shop, whichtoslay church
location.whichwichsandwichesdesc: You are in which wich sandiwch shop. You are tempted by food. Do not forget what's priority. Buy a sandwich or 3 piece of leather for hammer.;Enter 1 for trading hammer.;Enter 2 for trading for sandwich
location.shoeladyshopdesc: You are now inside Shoe Lady's Shop.NLMake a deal with the lady to obtain your horse for the escape.NLYou must collect 3 pieces of leather to trade for the horse
location.whichtoslaychurchdesc: You are now inside WhichToSlay Church.NLYou will be slayed
